caption: Our group of 4 managed to escape Cannibals Island, just in time! The rooms are very well prepared and engaging. One of the best escape rooms we have done. Would highly recommend.

Such an amazing experience we had! We did the "flÃ©au du druide" and it's a 10/10 The game master Thibault is amazing, the story, thrill, mechanics, puzzles, everything made sense and was very fun It's exactly the type of escape game experience and immersion we were looking for  Highly recommend

We did Cannible Island yesterday, and it was amazing. It was fun, the puzzles were really interesting and engaging and absolutely entertaining to solve. We finished the challenge just in time! I recommend!!!!

Incredible experience! We did Canibal Island yesterday and it was thrilling and a little bit scary (but in an entertaining way). Really cool puzzles and the set pieces were very well done. Highly recommended.

We played the game Druid. It was super fun! It was very varied with puzzles and effects and not always about codes. The special effects was really cool and the game master was very kind and generous as we took a long time to finish the game. All in all, highly recommended! I played a lot of escape games and this one was great.

ðŸŒŸ Super awesome experience! ðŸŒŸ I came on a work trip to Paris (by work trip I mean I work at an escape room and we came to Paris to play a bunch of them) and our group did the Cannibal Island and Operation Balkan. Personally I did the Cannibal Island, and it had one of the coolest puzzlesðŸ©¸and some of the best set and effects ðŸ’£ðŸ’¥ out of all the rooms I've ever done (I've played over 60 over the years). Our game master Emma struggled with the English but still managed to give us an amazing experience and helped us along the way just enough to let us meander and get scared* and solve puzzles, but still manage to escape on time! Cause I did speak French and was the only one in the group to do so I got the vibe that if language wasn't a barrier, all the acting bits and the whole spiel would've been even more on point, but props anyway for still making it an awesome experience! *About the getting scared part, oh my god I am one of the startliest people you will ever meet, and jesus christ did I have a field day. Not for the faint of heart for sure!
We did cannibal island and flÃ©au du druide and it was amazing! FlÃ©au was really original, some mechanisms are well imagined and result is a wonderful experience !

A thrilling experience in one of the most realistic escape rooms I have been playing so far. The staff is very friendly, too. Highly recommended to everyone, from beginners to more experienced players.

This is the second time we place our trust in Quest Factory to have a good time and once again we had a blast !  Managers are super kind, funny and passionate.  If you want to have a good time, laugh and have your brain working hard to solve the mysteries ... This is the place to go !  Can't wait for them to open their third room !
Did the cannibal one. Great fun. Can recommend.

One of the best way to get tangled into the game with your friends and family. Well-crafted riddles, immersive setting and talented narrator. I highly recommend this place. Best played with 5 players. Can be played in English or in French.
The cannibal island was definitely great, hope to come back and do the other quests soon !! Also, very immersive and awesome staff
It was a really nice experience and Gary is really awesome game master. Highly recommended!
Very good scenery, super good staff.. in my opinion a bit tough for only 2 people. Some enigmas were not too obvious. Very good level of details
Wonderful way to enhance your Paris experience!  Great scenario, location not far from Eurostar terminal and English speaking team)) Even managed to improve my French vocabulary! Many thanks!!
The cannibal island was definitely great, hope to come back and do the other quests soon !! Also, very immersive and awesome staff
The Best Escape room ever 10/10, we did the Cannibal Island absolutely amazing, not just an escape room, it's a living experience with some scary things, love it
We done " Operation Balkans " very good fun and good setup ! Had a really good time.
Great place. We had fun. Most important, people are super friendly. I recommend to visit
Wonderful experience in a very great place ! Employees are very nice and very helpful. Available in French and English.
Very fun place with a great host !
Excellent
A fun challenge with a really awesome gamemaster!!
Super moment :)
Cannibal island âœ…âœ…
Unique escape rooms
A good escape game

We are emerging from the Bane of the Druids. It's really the cream of the crop: ultra-quality decor and equipment, super effective special effects and narration and, icing on the cake, a nice and very skilled web master to accompany us. Everything was perfect. The atmosphere is exceptional but the design of the room is not to be outdone: clever, varied, the different challenges and enigmas took us through lots of emotions and put all our abilities to work. To be done as a priority!

A big thank you to the entire Quest Factory team for these exceptional rooms! Both adventures are incredible: we dive into magnificent settings while leading the investigation in a perfectly scripted and paced game.  The immersion is total, thanks to top game masters (S/o Hugh!).  In short, go for it without hesitation, you will love it!

I admit I don't understand the glowing reviews. We did the druid. So yes, some mechanisms are obviously cool.  But the layout is flat, the decorations at the beginning could not be more basic, certain puzzles are uninteresting and not integrated into the theme (those in the drawer among others), the black is too present, with only one lamp available we saw nothing. The GM intervenes too much at the beginning and we don't understand why... in short, a disappointed exit

Come and test the Druid's Bane, an escape of remarkable quality! The realistic settings, a technology that brings the magic to life, the puzzles well integrated into the story and which really teach us about the Gauls. There is contemplation, fun and sometimes a little pressure which works very well! Game Master at the top, I have great memories!

Incredible and immersive experience, we had a great time in the Druidâ€™s Bane escape. Thanks to Oriane our gamemaster for her warm and friendly welcome, and her support in the game! We will come back with pleasure to try the other rooms ðŸ˜Š â€¦

Excellent experience We are put at ease, we take the time to chat with the great game master, and the adventure begins So the 3 of us left for Cannibal Island. Very immersive settings, numerous and varied puzzles and surprises!! Excellent atmosphere Looking forward to testing the other rooms!

One day for two rooms, the Druid's Bane then Cannibal Island.  After nearly 30 rooms under my belt, the scourge is clearly in my top 3!!!  The adventure is original, the puzzles very coherent, the level of difficulty is quite high, the quality of the scenery and the immersion has been pushed to its peak.  Frankly, the scourge is an excellent surprise and a great pleasure under the control of GM Hugo!!!  Cannibal Island is an older room with already well-established and known puzzles and mechanisms. The story is playful, amusing with a very good role for GM Hugues. Shorter in time, its level of difficulty is accessible to everyone. The settings, and certain puzzles are absolutely incredible... The perfect cross between Koh Lanta and Mac Gyver.  A final word to finish, thank you to Hugo and Hugues for their sympathy and professionalism. The welcome and immersion were perfect.

First escape game experience for me..a birthday present from my children who already have several game experiences under their belt...great family time with the scourge of the druids..laughter and fear...a lot animation thanks to AurÃ¨le and the mischievous little character who accompanies us on our journey... informative and entertaining... to try without hesitation
Came to do the druid's flail with the family, it was great, we had a blast! Top-notch settings, immersive experiences, and thanks to our Game Master, AurÃ¨le, very, very nice and very funny! ðŸ˜€ â€¦

Coming as a team to face the Druid's Bane, we were pleasantly surprised by the quality of this escape game. The experience was perfectly orchestrated from start to finish, with an immersive setting, original puzzles and a fearsome druid who captivated us throughout the adventure. We would also like to send an honorable mention to Mini Chose as well as to Andy, our excellent game master, for providing us with lamps, although the pizzas were lacking... A big thank you from the whole team!

What to say? After more than 100 rooms played, this one is definitely my favorite!  We came on November 2 and created the room The Druid's Bane. From the start, we were 100% immersed in the story, thanks to our game master and his PERFECT acting! But also thanks to the superb settings and the way in which the clues are transmitted to us: everything is done so that our minds do not leave the game. In short, whether it was the settings, the puzzles, the welcomeâ€¦ everything was GREAT!! !  We will come back without hesitation!!!
